mapper.insert: insert into game (Id, enterTime, result, moveSteps, completeTime, userId, pokersId) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{entertime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{result,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{movesteps,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{completetime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{userid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{pokersid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

userId,
pokersId,

mapper.update:
update game
enterTime = #{entertime,jdbcType=DATE},
result = #{result,jdbcType=TINYINT},
moveSteps = #{movesteps,jdbcType=INTEGER},
completeTime = #{completetime,jdbcType=DATE},
userId = #{userid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
pokersId = #{pokersid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
